item.title: Great Customizable Forms - Designing with Purpose
item.description: Working as a software engineer at Kugadi, we are always looking at developing tools to improve the customer experience and at the same time provide a workflow that is both intuitive and easy to use. We recognize that one size does not fit all but how do we balance ease of use with a fully flexible solution? My current project is developing a customizable form for our clientsâ€™ reports and the Officer Assist app.
